Generation VII.Sun: Its body is gaseous and frail. It slowly grows as it collects dust from the atmosphere.
Generation VII.Moon: In ages past, it was called the child of the stars. It's said to be a Pokémon from another world, but no specific details are known.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Even though its helpless, gaseous body can be blown away by the slightest breeze, it doesn't seem to care.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Whether or not it's a Pokémon from this world is a mystery. When it's in a jam, it warps away to a safe place to hide.

Generation VIII.Sword: This Pokémon came from another universe. Its gaseous body is so light that even a gentle breeze can blow it away. *
Generation VIII.Shield: Cosmog is very curious but not very cautious, often placing itself in danger. If things start to look dicey, it teleports away. *

Generation VII.Sun: Lake of the Sunne ( Only one )
Generation VII.Moon: Lake of the Moone ( Only one )
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Lake of the Sunne ( Only one )
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Lake of the Moone ( Only one )

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Received from an elderly woman in Freezington after stopping Glastrier 's/ Spectrier 's attack
